Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turns

Class MarketTurn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turns.MarketTurn
public class MarketTurn
extends java.lang.Object
class to manage the turn to take resources from market

  • Method Details

    • marketChooseLine

      public void marketChooseLine​(java.lang.String namePlayer, int line, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> leaderMarketWhiteChange)
      Parameters:
      namePlayer - name of the player who is taking resources from the market
      line - line choose from the player in the market
      leaderMarketWhiteChange - Arraylist of boolean that specify if a player is using a market-white-change leader's power and in which position, the boolean is in the same position of the leader card the player want to use

    • saveNewDepositState

      public boolean saveNewDepositState​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> newDepositState, int discardResources, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDepositState)
      method to check if the state of the reorganized deposit from a player is valid and manage the discarding of resource from the player
      Parameters:
      newDepositState - Arraylist that specify the state of the reorganized deposit
      discardResources - the number of the discarded resources
      isAdditional - boolean that specify if there's an aditional deposit
      additionalDepositState - The Arraylist that specify the state of the additional deposit
      Returns:
      if a player has reorganised correctly its deposit
